title: SYN - Sign Languge Recognition
longDescription: Full-stack web app for real time ASL recognition using webcam input. Model built with a custom dataset and MediaPipe Hands. Model served via REST API.

title: 2024 Election Model
description: A highly accurate prediction model for the 2024 election
longDescription: R program that used Selenium to scrape polling data from aggregators. Accurately predicted vote share in 6 of 7 swing states. Generated probabilities in line with major betting markets and mainstream modelers.

title: First Person Platformer
description: A simple platformer game I made to test out Godot's capabilities
longDescription: Features timed trials, grapple hook, wall running. Overally a pretty fun character controller to mess around with
